channel.title: How can I check for a subscription/permission level
channel.description: Hello i was just wondering if someone could point me in the right direction to check for a subscription/permission level possibly using an if statement, thanks :heart:

item.title: How can I check for a subscription/permission level
item.dc:creator: lIMonkieIl
item.description:
Or

Foreach(var sub in Login.KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscriptions)
{
///Then you have these vars to use.
///sub.subscription = sub name
//sub.expiry = expiry date for that sub
//sub.timeleft = time left on the sub

///So now you can use that information by doing

if(sub.name == “TheSubName”)
{
///you could then open a new form maybe
Form form1 = new Form();
form1.Show();
this.Hide();
///or even show/enable a button

ButtonName.enable = true

}
if(sub.name == “AnotherSubName”)
{
///do code here again but for a different sub name.
}

}

item.title: How can I check for a subscription/permission level
item.dc:creator: lIMonkieIl
item.description:
Do the same as above but put the form where keyauthapp is at so if you’re form is call login and this one is call main you would do like this for example

Login.KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscriptions.Count

Hope that helps

Read full topic

item.title: How can I check for a subscription/permission level

item.description:
not sure if this will work for me as the form i need to put it on is separate from the login form, I’ve tried getting the username, but haven’t been able to. When i use the subscriptions.Count or anything like that I get the error that it returned null. So I’m not even sure what I’m attempting is possible.

item.title: How can I check for a subscription/permission level
item.dc:creator: Hiro
item.description:
for (var i = 0; i < KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscriptions.Count; i++)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(" Subscription name: " + KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscriptions[i].subscription + " - Expires at: " + UnixTimeToDateTime(long.Parse(KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscriptions[i].expiry)) + " - Time left in seconds: " + KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscriptions[i].timeleft);

            if(KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscriptions[i].subscription == "level one")
                        enable only bla
             else
                        enable more bla bla bla
            }
